fulltext:
26
Griff in,  Rings of Krull type
2.  The rings occurring in Proposition 20 are known as Independent rings of Krull type.  Obvious simplifications occur for such rings since the valuations are independent and we need no longer be concerned with compatibility relations. 
3.  The rings occurring in Proposition 22 are known as Generalized Krull rings.  These have been studied by Ribenboim [ 14 ].
